      Response buildAndProcessRsa(java.lang.String plainText)
      Encrypts a given plain text with RSA Algorithm, stores into the cloud and returns the id with which the record can be fetched for decryption

      • buildAndProcessRsa

        Response buildAndProcessRsa(java.lang.String plainText)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Encrypts a given plain text with RSA Algorithm, stores into the cloud and returns the id with which the record can be fetched for decryption
        Parameters:
        plainText - Plain text as user input
        Returns:
        Response object with response data that contains record stored in the cloud, status and exceptions if any
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getPlainText

        Response getPlainText(int id)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Decrypts a stored encrypted string with public and private key
        Parameters:
        id - Identifier that was returned as a result of encryption response
        Returns:
        Response object with decrypted plain text as response data, status and exceptions if any
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
